T02D2155:250a-1: kra ma sha ta n'a ma /
T02D2155:250a-3: rim ba drug pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2155:250a-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2155:250a-5: 'gro rnams rtog pa'i ngor gyur rtog gnas te //
T02D2155:250a-6: de la rtog cing dge dang mi dger 'dzin //
T02D2155:250a-7: dug dgra'i gseb thar chu srin kha ru ni //
T02D2155:250a-8: gru chad bzhin du dga' dang mi dga' ste //
T02D2155:250a-9: rtag tu brtse bas 'dzin cing nga ros 'jigs //
T02D2155:250a-10: de la dngos po kun gyis 'dud cing 'dud //
T02D2155:250a-11: bka' drin thob dang rang nyams rtog de dran /
T02D2155:250a-12: de 'dir 'dod lha mnyes dang nges 'byung dang //
T02D2155:250a-13: sbyor ba gzhan gyis nges par 'byung ba yin //
T02D2155:250a-14: dang po gnyis yin gnyis pa bzhi ru snang /
T02D2155:250a-15: dang po bzlas pa 'grub dang grub pa'i rtags //
T02D2155:250a-16: gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ni //
T02D2155:250a-17: glegs bam du ma 'tsher mthong lag gis len //
T02D2155:250a-18: rnga chen dung dang cha lang dril bu dang //
T02D2155:250a-19: mchod pa'i sgra sgrogs du ma'i gzugs mthong ba //
T02D2155:250a-20: mandal dkyil 'khor las byed chos 'chad nyan //
T02D2155:250a-21: glegs bam klog cing dkyus ltar 'dri ba smra //
T02D2155:250a-22: ras ris la ni bde gshegs gzugs brnyan ni //
T02D2155:250a-23: du ma mthong zhing rten gyi gzugs mthong ba //
T02D2155:250a-24: rol mo'i gzugs byed mchod rten gdugs sogs byed //
T02D2155:250a-25: rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma rnyed dam mthong //
T02D2155:250a-26: me tog sna tshogs gsal bar mthong ba dang //
T02D2155:250a-27: nyi zla'i 'od 'bab gza' ska ra go mthong dang //
T02D2155:250a-28: me gtong du langs nam mkha' yang ni 'khrigs //
T02D2155:250a-29: rdzing la chu 'dre na khron ba las ni le na //
T02D2155:250a-30: 'bras kyi myu gu bzang dang lo ma bzang //
T02D2155:250a-31: ce sbyang la sogs thul ba gos bzang gyon //
T02D2155:250a-32: rgyan cha bzang zhing mtshon cha rno ba 'dzin //
T02D2155:250a-33: de rnams byung gyur gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags //
T02D2155:250a-34: rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste rim pa dang po'o /
T02D2155:250a-36: // / mig la sogs pa'i dbang pos srid gsum mthong //
T02D2155:250a-37: thos dang snga phyi'i skye dran rdzas kun lud //
T02D2155:250a-38: ras ris bzhad cing ro sogs 'od 'byung dri //
T02D2155:250a-39: mun nag me tog char 'bab 'ja' tshon snang ;
T02D2155:250a-40: / tshogs na chos 'chad mun nag glegs bam dpyod //
T02D2155:250a-41: nam mkha' stong las sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra //
T02D2155:250a-42: 'brug sgra glog 'gyur thog chen 'bebs pa dang //
T02D2155:250a-43: nam mkha' stong zhing sprin sngon mthong ba dang //
T02D2155:250a-44: de bzhin mthing nag sprin sngon nges 'gyur dang //
T02D2155:250a-45: snyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od ldan sa gzhi bdal /
T02D2155:250b-0: @250b ras ris lugs ma la sogs bde gshegs gzugs //
T02D2155:250b-1: mchod cing skor ba byed dang rten la skor //
T02D2155:250b-2: dkyil 'khor bris nas mchod dam dbang bskur ba //
T02D2155:250b-3: mdzes pa'i snong du me tog sna tshogs thu //
T02D2155:250b-4: rin chen sna tshogs me tog bee p'ur rnyed //
T02D2155:250b-5: shin tu skam pa'i las chu rdol ba //
T02D2155:250b-6: bdag nyid me dpung nang 'dug srog chags tshig //
T02D2155:250b-7: ting 'dzin gsal zhing yi dags gzugs la brtson //
T02D2155:250b-8: dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas ni du ma mthong //
T02D2155:250b-9: rtse gcig pa yi bsam gtan byed //
T02D2155:250b-10: seng ge'i khri steng gnas pa rmi //
T02D2155:250b-11: lha khang gnas gzhi rtsig mchungs dang //
T02D2155:250b-14: bar snang 'phur zhing bsdigs pa'i ltos 'gro len //
T02D2155:250b-15: 'di 'dra'i rmi lam gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags //
T02D2155:250b-16: rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o //
T02D2155:250b-17: / gnyis pa bzhi pa'i dang po'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2155:250b-18: sbyor ba gzhan byung rnal 'byor nyid la 'ong //
T02D2155:250b-19: ri gzar dag la mi thar mthar zad lhung //
T02D2155:250b-20: ri brags 'dzul 'dod chu dong lhung ba dang //
T02D2155:250b-21: phyugs lhas 'dam rdzab bshang gci'i nang dang ni //
T02D2155:250b-22: kha dog dmar dang skya ba'i chu dag la //
T02D2155:250b-23: rtsub dang gnag pa'i gos dang dmar ba'i gos //
T02D2155:250b-24: shin tu hrul po'i tshe ta'i bags pa'i gyon //
T02D2155:250b-25: shing rtsi ri las lhung dogs rten med 'dug / gcer bur 'dug cing lcag lcig chu nang l'gro //
T02D2155:250b-26: gzung 'dzin yod pa'i rten sa de ru ni //
T02D2155:250b-27: nyin dang mtshan du rtag tu 'gro ba rmi //
T02D2155:250b-28: glang nag glang dmar ba nag ba dmar zhon //
T02D2155:250b-29: rtsub pa'i gos gyon ga ta la zhon pa //
T02D2155:250b-30: ma he ba lang khyus 'gro sogs rmi ba //
T02D2155:250b-31: gnag dang ba lang khyus 'gro sogs mthong dang //
T02D2155:250b-32: rta dang ga ta mig zlum khyus 'gro sogs //
T02D2155:250b-33: be ta tshe ta khyus 'gro sogs mthong ba //
T02D2155:250b-34: seng gi spyang dang khyi sogs mche can rmi //
T02D2155:250b-35: bse dang byi ba snger chags rmi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2155:250b-36: sbyor ba gzhan gyis gnod pa 'gyur ba rnal 'byor
T02D2155:250b-37: pa la mchan ma 'ong ba'i rim pa ste gsum
T02D2155:250b-39: / gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2155:250b-40: rnal 'byor stobs kyis mi thub mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2155:250b-41: bya dang ba sbrul gdug gnas pa'i mtsho //
T02D2155:250b-42: chu srin nya dang chu sogs gnas pa dang //
T02D2155:250b-43: sdig pa sdom dang rtsangs pa rkang mangs dang //
T02D2155:251a-2: de rnams rmi gyur bran rnams sbyor ba gnod //
T02D2155:251a-3: sbrul dang sbal pa sngon ma dang sdig pa dang //
T02D2155:251a-4: bya sogs lus 'byar mchus 'debs gshog sbrug dang //
T02D2155:251a-5: be ta la sogs rdzi med mdog rgod rmi //
T02D2155:251a-6: mi thub rtags te bud med smyo ba dang /
T02D2155:251a-7: mi thub kun la brdeg 'gyur mdog rgod ma //
T02D2155:251a-8: rgyan bzangs mdzes pa'i snod du zas sogs bkang //
T02D2155:251a-9: rtag tu rgan mor 'ong 'gyur mi thub rtags //
T02D2155:251a-10: ltos 'gros lus dkris ldan zhing mi phrel dang //
T02D2155:251a-11: sdig dang rtsangs sogs 'byang zhing mchus btsugs pa //
T02D2155:251a-12: sbrang bu mchu rings srog chags phra mo rnams //
T02D2155:251a-13: khrag 'jib lus nang zhugs gyur mi thub rtags //
T02D2155:251a-14: chu srin nya sogs chu chen 'phyo zhing 'khyu //
T02D2155:251a-15: gnag dang dmar srog chu yis khyer ba rmi //
T02D2155:251a-16: de yang mi thub rtags te brtson par bzlog / dad ldan brtson pas mi 'grub gang yang med //
T02D2155:251a-17: sbyor ba gzhan las byung ba'i gnod pa rnal 'byor
T02D2155:251a-18: pa'i stobs kyis mi thub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa
T02D2155:251a-20: / gnyis pa bzhi pa gsum pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2155:251a-21: rnal 'byor rtsal gyis thub cing non pa'i rtags //
T02D2155:251a-22: ma he gnag sogs rdzud cing rid pa dang //
T02D2155:251a-23: dud 'gro rnams ni btags sam brtod gyur pa //
T02D2155:251a-24: dud 'gro dgras khyer brtod dam rkun mos khyer //
T02D2155:251a-25: dud 'gro 'tsho dang 'bras kyi phub ma 'chag / dud 'gro 'khor dang rdzi yis sbyong ba dang //
T02D2155:251a-26: dud 'gro yor dang 'gab thegs thub ba'i rtags //
T02D2155:251a-27: dud 'gro gsad dang btsos nas za ba dang //
T02D2155:251a-28: rang gzhan me byung dud 'gro tshig gyur dang //
T02D2155:251a-29: de ni nges par dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags //
T02D2155:251a-30: bud med rgud cing do dma' shi ba dang //
T02D2155:251a-31: du zhing rgyan bzang gus pas phyag phyed dang //
T02D2155:251a-32: gnas nas gzhan 'gro thub pa'i rtags su bstan //
T02D2155:251a-33: sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags du ma rnams //
T02D2155:251a-34: bsad dam zos sam shi'am ded gyur dang //
T02D2155:251a-35: skem dang tshig gyur thub pa'i rtags yin no //
T02D2155:251a-36: bya dang byi ba sbrul gdug gnas mtsho skams //
T02D2155:251a-37: bud med zhum zhing du ba thub pa'i rtags //
T02D2155:251a-38: sbyor ba gzhan rnal 'byor pa'i rtsal gyis non pa'i ltas kyi rim pa ste lnga pa'o /
T02D2155:251a-40: // / gnyis pa bzhi pa bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2155:251a-41: sbyor gzhan rab tu khros par gyur pa ni //
T02D2155:251a-42: rang nyid mi g-yog nas na gnas nas ni //
T02D2155:251a-43: sbrul pa sna tshogs gzugs ni ston cing phyogs //
T02D2155:251b-0: 'khor dang @251b bka' yi pho nya 'gyed cing 'dug
T02D2155:251b-1: / rigs mtho'i 'dra 'bag bu chung rab byung gzugs
T02D2155:251b-2: // 'od gyur thang las skyes pa'i pho nya yin //
T02D2155:251b-3: de ni bzlog par bya ba'i thabs ni gzugs //
T02D2155:251b-4: blon po yul gyi rgan rabs 'od 'gyur dang //
T02D2155:251b-5: brod pa skyes pa gzhon nu bon po'i gzugs //
T02D2155:251b-6: sngags pa'i gzugs ni 'ong 'gyur brag skyes yin //
T02D2155:251b-7: de bcos bya ba'i thabs ni bstan pa yin //
T02D2155:251b-8: dkar dmar gnag cing shin tu mang ba yi //
T02D2155:251b-9: ba lang 'tsho zhing phyugs nang 'dug pa dang //
T02D2155:251b-10: ral pa bzang po bud med smug nag dang //
T02D2155:251b-11: g-ya' rig ngas ri las skyes pho nya yin //
T02D2155:251b-12: de phyir thabs ni du ma yod par gsungs //
T02D2155:251b-13: bud med gzhon zhing rgyan bzangs rab byung ma //
T02D2155:251b-14: ma dang sru mo sring mo ni ne mo yi gzugs //
T02D2155:251b-15: nye du nye 'brel khrom chen bud med dang //
T02D2155:251b-16: bu mo chung ma mtsho las skyes pa yin //
T02D2155:251b-17: de ni mnan pa'i thabs ni bya ba dang //
T02D2155:251b-18: de rnams zhi 'gyur 'ga' zhig dbang du 'du //
T02D2155:251b-19: dbang du 'gro ba rtog pa'i nad las thar //
T02D2155:251b-20: khyi la sogs pa dud 'gro phal cher ni //
T02D2155:251b-21: sbyor ba gzhan gyi pho nya yin pas bzlog //
T02D2155:251b-22: rang gi ngo bo gtso bo'i gzugs can te //
T02D2155:251b-23: dud 'gro'i gzugs ldan rgyan ldan de nyid do //
T02D2155:251b-24: nam mkha'i mthongs na gnas shing sprul pa yi //
T02D2155:251b-25: gzugs ni ma lus brjod kyis mi lang ste //
T02D2155:251b-26: de yang dpag tu med pa'i mtha' mi rtogs //
T02D2155:251b-27: de phyir bde gshegs mthu dang mtshungs pa yin //
T02D2155:251b-28: sbyor ba gzhan gyis bka'i pho nya bkye ba'i rim pa ste drug pa'o /
T02D2155:251b-30: // / bla ma'i bka' dang lhag lhas gnang ba byin //
T02D2155:251b-31: 'gro la brtse bas rtog pa cung zhig sbyar //
T02D2155:251b-32: de yi ge bci bsags pa //
T02D2155:251b-33: rtog la nges shing nges rtogs shog //
T02D2155:251b-34: rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba rtags gsal bar byed pa /
T02D2155:251b-35: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i
T02D2155:251b-36: slob dpon dz'a wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
